description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 7x + 6.
comments: n, 7*n+6, 49*n+48, 343*n+342, 2401*n+2400 and 16807*n+16806 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..10000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(7*n+6) and IsPrime(49*n+48) and IsPrime(343*n+342) and IsPrime(2401*n+2400) and IsPrime(16807*n+16806)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
